component.paths: mom6/src/MOM6/config_src/dynamic mom6/src/MOM6/config_src/coupled_driver mom6/src/MOM6/src/*/ mom6/src/MOM6/src/*/*/ ocean_shared/generic_tracers ocean_shared/mocsy/src

source.csh:
\rm -rf ocean_null git clone -b $(MOM6_GIT_TAG) https://github.com/NOAA-GFDL/MOM6-examples.git mom6 pushd mom6 git checkout $(MOM6_GIT_TAG) #needed for older git on zeus git submodule init src/MOM6 src/SIS2 src/icebergs tools/python/MIDAS git clone --recursive https://github.com/NOAA-GFDL/MOM6.git src/MOM6 git clone https://github.com/NOAA-GFDL/SIS2.git src/SIS2 git clone https://github.com/NOAA-GFDL/icebergs.git src/icebergs git submodule update #This gets the right version of submodules # delete these cherry-picks once a tag is finalized # These commits update the symlinks and paths to the new input datasets git remote add jkrasting https://github.com/jkrasting/MOM6-examples.git git fetch jkrasting git cherry-pick b277e8178ac87994615e7da3ef9de3f608393473 git cherry-pick c133ce21801484475ef58288526ec75dafa106c3 git cherry-pick 5bcd58bbda2b4284f882a47cbfde5d5872c90ae2 git cherry-pick 10408243d9ce069810986c5a1c13cbb9c1fdece9 git cherry-pick 2afd337a2ab45ac191683d64379e780537d8528a popd ######################################################################## #updates needed to run new experiments. #Remove this block when the updates are tagged (cd mom6/src/MOM6 && git fetch && git checkout 85ad09dba99 ) ######################################################################## pushd mom6 set platform_domain = `perl -T -e "use Net::Domain(hostdomain) ; print hostdomain"` if ("${platform_domain}" =~ *"fairmont.rdhpcs.noaa.gov"* ) then ln -s /scratch4/GFDL/gfdlscr/pdata/gfdl_O/datasets/ .datasets else if ("${platform_domain}" =~ *"ccs.ornl.gov"* ) then ln -s /lustre/atlas/proj-shared/cli061/pdata/gfdl_O/datasets/ .datasets else ln -s /lustre/f1/pdata/gfdl_O/datasets/ .datasets endif popd
test -e mom6/.datasets if ($status != 0) then echo ""; echo "" ; echo " WARNING: .datasets link in MOM6 examples directory is invalid"; echo ""; echo "" endif

component.name: coupler
component.requires: fms atmos_dyn atmos_phys land_lad2 ice_sis mom6

experiment.name: AM4p0p3k_2010aer_PIpcairco2

publicMetadata.comment: Experiment name = $(name) For more information please refer to the Coupled Working Group Wiki. and Global Diagnostics Page. - using a newer ocean topography (John Dunne) and newer hydrography files (Krista Dunne)

experiment.description:
2017/09/21 JGJ Build coupled model from AM4fullchem LWH: /ncrc/home1/Larry.Horowitz/awg/warsaw_201707/xml_warsaw_201707/awg_warsaw_201707.xml expt c96L49_am4p0_AM4chem_terpene_1850climo JGJ: ESM4p1_1850_Conc.xml (#808 for ocean, #814 for atm/land nml)
Ocean is from #808, except change KD to 1.5e-5 check with Land WG for namelist and other dataset updates streamline for CMIP6
Set up ESM4 C-driven 1850 PI-Control Prototype C96L49_am4p0_OMp5 + COBALT + atmos_co2 tracer
added MOM6 settings from MDT run #808 Updated COBALT code from CAS: ~/fre/updates/COBALT/generic_COBALT_091217_jo2_plus_btm_fix.F90 Updated COBALT data table settings match those for BLINGv2 Updated COBALT IC to add fedet_btf set to zero Updated COBALT field_table to add fedet_btf Use mocsy as carbon equilibration method.
Preind DIC GLODAPv1 for now - need to get GLODAPv2 from OCMIP website updated CM4 IC to add Jan 1 1850 atm co2 latest CMIP6 OBGC diags
warsaw_201707 codebase override pcair co2 - set to 1850 Jan 1 co2 value Add in mocsy updates
DID NOT CHANGE to match CM4B PI_Control spinup #814: harvesting_nml: do_harvesting=F, grazing_intensity=3.65 static_veg_nml: use_static_veg=F
UPDATED to match CM4B PI_Control spinup #814: atm_chem field tables: add chem_param lines aerosolrad_driver_nml: do_swaerosol_forcing, do_lwaerosol_forcing lscloud_driver_nml: use_cf_metadata cana_nml: sai_turb soil_data_nml: use_comp_for_push photosynthesis_nml: lai_eps vegn_data_nml: csc_lai, dat_snow_crit, use_light_saber, sai_cover, sai_rad, min_lai
OMITTED during development since these are for cmip diagnostics only: COSP namelists atmos_tropopause_nml physics_driver_nml: donner_meso_is_largescale, do_cosp, do_modis_yim
NOTES: kept settings from #814 (compared to LWH c96L49_am4p0_AM4chem_SOA): aerosolrad_driver_nml: do_swaerosol_forcing, do_lwaerosol_forcing cg_grag_nml: Bt_0, Bt_nh, Bt_sh tiedtke_macro_nml: eros_scale_c, eros_scale_t rotstayn_klein_mp_nml: vfact
Compile on Gaea C4 (intel-16).
Add interactive dust emissions
LWH (2/14/2018) Updates from "j" to "k" configuration: - Code updates to testing_20180202 - Prevent tracer emissions through sea ice (from #922) - Correct calc_{ch4,n2o}_* settings in radiative_gases_nml (no effect in climo runs, but caused slowdown in runs with time-varying forcings) - Updated DMS source from ocean (from Fabien) - New ocean background latitudinally dependent viscosity (from #917) - Restart ocean from WOA, but keep spun-up sea ice and icebergs - MOM restart bugfix (included as a csh hack for now) - Decrease gamma(HO2) from 1.0 to 0.2
Niki Zadeh (3/2/2018) This is a new xml. Updates for LM4.1 - Origin: LM4.1 changes by Sergey from his branch user/slm/esm4p3 - Update: New 1/2 degree ocean grid from John Krasting user/jpk/ESMp3_mods - Merged atmos from Larry H. "k" run in the notes above LWH (2/14/2018) - Added the recommended settings for ocean (Smag) is in experiment ESM4p3p2k_1850C_PIpcairco2_smag - Renamed the compile component to esm4.1_compile (to discourage using/sharing in CM4/ESM4p0 runs) - Removed cm4_libs_compile component. No need to build the cm4_libs_compile any more. Just build esm4.1_compile - Removed ice_sis from the build.

input.csh:
# Copy AWG and OWG ascii input files to GFDL (waiting for FRE to do this for us) if ( $?flagOutputXferOn && $?flagOutputPostProcessOn && $currentSeg == 1 ) then #gcp --batch does not understand some variations of home filesystem like /autofs/mnt/ncrc-svm1_home1 so we need to massage rtsxml to comply set xmldirlocal = `dirname $rtsxml | sed -r "s/^\/(autofs|ncrc)\/.+\/$USER\//\~$USER\//"` set xmldirRemote = `echo $xmldirlocal | sed -r "$patternSedHome"` set platform_domain = `perl -T -e "use Net::Domain(hostdomain) ; print hostdomain"` if ("${platform_domain}" == "ncrc.gov") then set xmldirRemote = `echo $xmldirlocal | sed -r "$patternSedHome;$patternSedCTMP;$patternSedCPERM"` gcp --batch -cd -r --sync $xmldirlocal/awg_include gfdl:$(AWG_INPUT_HOME_GFDL)/.. gcp --batch -cd -r --sync $xmldirlocal/awg_include gfdl:$xmldirRemote/ else if ("${platform_domain}" =~ *"fairmont.rdhpcs.noaa.gov"* ) then gcp -cd -r --sync $xmldirlocal/awg_include gfdl:$(AWG_INPUT_HOME_GFDL)/.. gcp -cd -r --sync $xmldirlocal/awg_include gfdl:$xmldirRemote/ endif #trick to copy MOM6 directory but avoid traversing the .datasets links tar cvf mom6.tar --exclude='.datasets' -C $(MOM6_EXAMPLES) . > /dev/null #tar cvf mom6.tar --exclude='.datasets' --exclude='src' --exclude='INPUT' -C $(MOM6_EXAMPLES) . > /dev/null mkdir mom6 tar xvf mom6.tar -C ./mom6 > /dev/null if ("${platform_domain}" == "ncrc.gov") then gcp --batch -cd -r --sync mom6 gfdl:$(NB_ROOT)/ else if ("${platform_domain}" =~ *"fairmont.rdhpcs.noaa.gov"* ) then gcp -cd -r --sync mom6 gfdl:$(NB_ROOT)/ endif endif
# create dummy MOM6 parameter file for do_ocean=.false. touch $work/INPUT/MOM_input touch $work/INPUT/MOM_override touch $work/INPUT/MOM_layout touch $work/INPUT/SIS_input touch $work/INPUT/SIS_override touch $work/INPUT/SIS_layout ln -s $work/INPUT/topog.nc $work/INPUT/ocean_topog.nc
# Record the job stdout location for later use timings database cat >> $HOME/frejobs_stdout <<EOF_frejobs $stdoutDir/$FRE_JOBID EOF_frejobs
###################################################################### # The finite-volume cubed-sphere model should have the dry mass # adjusted at the initial model time only. This script determines # if the model is at the initial time by comparing model start time # and current time in the coupler.res file. ###################################################################### # set adjust_dry_mass = ".true." # if (-e $work/INPUT/coupler.res) then # set t1 = (`grep "Model start time" $work/INPUT/coupler.res | awk '{print $1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6}'`) # set t2 = (`grep "Current model time" $work/INPUT/coupler.res | awk '{print $1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6}'`) # foreach i (1 2 3 4 5 6) # if ( $t1[$i] != $t2[$i] ) then # set adjust_dry_mass = ".false." # break # endif # end # endif if ( $currentSeg == 1 ) then set adjust_dry_mass = ".true." else set adjust_dry_mass = ".false." endif
set atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads set atmos_threads = $atmos_nthreads
#timing runs show that nyblocks = 2 * atm_threads perform better than nyblocks = atm_threads set nxblock = 1 set nyblock = $atm_threads @ nyblock = 2 * $atm_threads

input.namelist: gas_conc_filename ='gas_conc_3D_am3p9.nc' isoprene_source = 'guenther' isoprene_filename = 'emissions.isoprene.1x1.2000.nc' isoprene_input_name(1) = 'biogenic' isoprene_SOA_yield = 0.10 terpene_source = 'guenther' terpene_filename = 'emissions.terpenes.1x1.2000.nc' terpene_input_name(1) = 'biogenic' terpene_SOA_yield = 0.10 use_interactive_tracers = .true. use_interactive_BVOC_emis = .true.
